IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Presentation of theatre performances and other live events for the general public
IRS990.MissionDesc: Boxcar Theatre is dedicated to supporting bold concepts and unique visions of emerging and established directors. Utilizing dynamic imagery physical movement and storytelling Boxcar strives to establish an environment in which audiences are engaged in a visceral sense and an intellectual capacity.
IRS990.Desc: Presented theatrical performances and live events

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: Boxcar Theatre made a program-related investment of $223,945 in Mr Tipsy's US Investors LLC; Nick Olivero is the Managing Member of this company

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Nick Olivero Executive Director and Peter Liu a member of the board are both members of Sam Lee Laundry LLC a theatrical production company that partnered with Boxcar Theatre to present "The Speakeasy" from 2016-2019.
All changes to compensation for the Executive Director are approved by a formal vote of the Board of Directors after consideration of comparability data and deliberation.
All governance documents are available from the organization upon request and in addition tax returns are available on the Guidestar website.
